capabilities.effectName: Full Speed Control - Cycle (speed is set by the cyan channel)
Full Speed Control - Color scan (speed or fixed position set individually on cyan, magenta, and yellow channels)
Full Speed Control - Random (speed is set by the cyan channel)
MSpeed Controlled - Cycle (speed is set by the cyan channel)
MSpeed Controlled - Color scan (speed or fixed position set individually on cyan, magenta, and yellow channels)

capabilities.comment: Lamp assisted strobes (periodic and random strobe functions are lamp assisted, ramp functions are not lamp assisted)
Lamp/mechanical dimmings (lamp output will vary from a minimum to 700 Watts as the mechanical dimming ranges from 0-100%)
Lamp only dimming (electronic dimming only from a minimum to 700 Watts)

capabilities.helpWanted: Are the automatically added speed values correct?
